traits.name: Bad Flier
entries: The abyssal chicken falls at the end of a turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The abyssal chicken makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) slashing damage.
